entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:04 p.m. EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 9.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 1:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

Temperature: 9.6°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 15 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 8.4°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
